regen.absent_element: visual indication on MMI if handset is in use for group calls
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a visual indication on the MMI when the handset is in use during group calls.

regen.absent_element: the situation of connecting calls to the handset when it is off the hook
regen.new_specification: Calls shall automatically be connected to the handset when it is off the hook.

regen.absent_element: Operation for connecting incoming calls to the handset when off the hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically connect incoming group or broadcast calls to the handset when it is off the hook.

label: be connected to the handset if the handset is off hook.
absence: situation of the handset is off hook
